author: jtyberg
msg: Fix geo timeouts to match W3C spec.
watchPosition is hamstrung by native API, which requires update interval to be half timeout value.

author: jtyberg
msg: Suppress PhoneGap geolocation if HTML5 geolocation implemented.
Allow users to override HTML5 implementation with PhoneGap implementation.

author: jtyberg
msg: Stop stomping on navigator object.  How rude.

author: jtyberg
msg: Remove global listener in fail callback.
Fixes bug that would cause geo.getCurrentPosition() to produce 'Still waiting...' error after previous attempt failed.

author: jtyberg
msg: Initial attempt made use of Widget JS API. Works on BB OS 5.0, but crashes hard on BB OS 6.0.
